name: cifti-label-probability
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
FIND FREQUENCY OF CIFTI LABELS.

This command outputs a set of soft ROIs, one for each label in the input, where the value is how many of the input maps had that label at that vertex/voxel, divided by the number of input maps.

inputs.name: label_maps
inputs.description: cifti dlabel file containing individual label maps from many subjects

inputs.name: probability_dscalar_out
inputs.description: the relative frequencies of each label at each vertex/voxel

inputs.name: opt_exclude_unlabeled
inputs.description: don't make a probability map of the unlabeled key

output-files.name: probability_dscalar_out
output-files.description: the relative frequencies of each label at each vertex/voxel
